com.pega.pegarules.pub.context

Interface PRDistributedMap<K extends java.io.Serializable,V extends java.io.Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    K -
    V -
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.Map<K,V>
    Deprecated. 
    This class is deprecated in favor of the componentized cluster in platform/kernel/cluster. See the readme for more information. Email GenesisTeam@pega.com with any questions

    @Deprecated
public interface PRDistributedMap<K extends java.io.Serializable,V extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.util.Map<K,V>
    PRDistributedMap : Represents a distributed map.
    Null Keys and Values are not supported. Behaves like java.util.Map.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface java.util.Map

        java.util.Map.Entry<K,V>

      Deprecated.

      java.util.Collection<V> values()
      Deprecated. 
      Returns a collection containing all values in the Map.

      Warn: The returned collection is not backed by the Map.
      So any changes to it is not reflected in the map and vice versa.
      Any modifications to the objects are also not reflected in the map.
      After modifications the object should be put into map again for changes to be visible.

      • get

        V get(java.lang.Object aKey)
        Deprecated. 
        Gets the value associated with given key from map. Null key is not supported.

        Warn: Any changes to the returned object will not be reflected in the map.
        After modifications the object should be put into map again for changes to be visible.
        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • put

        V put(K aKey,
      V aValue)
        Deprecated. 
        Associates the given key with given value in this map. If key is already present it is associated with new value.
        Null values are not allowed for both key and value.

        Warn: Once a value object is put into map any changes to the object will not be reflected in the map.
        After modifications the object should be put into map again for changes to be visible.
        Specified by:
        put in interface java.util.Map<K extends java.io.Serializable,V extends java.io.Serializable>
        Parameters:
        aKey -
        aValue -
        Returns:
        Old value associated with key or null if key was not present before.

      • putAll

        void putAll(java.util.Map<? extends K,? extends V> aMap)
        Deprecated. 
        Copies all of the mappings from the specified map to this map. If key is already present it is associated with new value.

        Warn: Once a value object is put into map any changes to the object will not be reflected in the map.
        After modifications the object should be put into map again for changes to be visible.
        Specified by:
        putAll in interface java.util.Map<K extends java.io.Serializable,V extends java.io.Serializable>

      • lock

        void lock(K aKey)
        Deprecated. 
        Acquires lock on specified key. Works even if key is non present in map.
        When lock is granted, other threads attempt to put an entry with this key into the map will get blocked till lock is released.
        The will be the behavior even when key is not present in map.
        If the lock is held by some other thread (on same node or different node), then the current thread waits till lock is acquired.
        Parameters:
        aKey -

      • tryLock

        boolean tryLock(K aKey)
        Deprecated. 
        Tries to acquire the lock for the specified key.
        If the lock is not available then the current thread doesn't wait and returns immediately with false value.
        Parameters:
        aKey -
        Returns:
        true if lock is acquired, false otherwise.

      • isLocked

        boolean isLocked(K aKey)
        Deprecated. 
        Checks the lock for the specified key.
        If the lock is acquired then returns true, else false.
        Parameters:
        aKey -
        Returns:
        true if lock is acquired, false otherwise.

      • unlock

        void unlock(K aKey)
        Deprecated. 
        Releases the lock for the specified key. It never blocks and returns immediately.
        Parameters:
        aKey - key to lock.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalMonitorStateException - if the current thread does not hold this lock

      • addEntryListener

        java.lang.String addEntryListener(PRDistributedMapEntryListener<K,V> aListener)
        Deprecated. 
        Adds an entry listener for this map.
        Listener will get notified for all map add/remove/update/evict events.
        Parameters:
        aListener - - a listener instance
        Returns:
        String - Event subscription identifier, this can later be used to unsubscribe

      • removeEntryListener

        boolean removeEntryListener(java.lang.String aEventSubscriptionIdentifier)
        Deprecated. 
        Removes the specified entry listener Returns silently if there is no such listener added before.
        Parameters:
        aEventSubscriptionIdentifier - - a registered listener
        Returns:
        true if registration is removed, false otherwise
